list_translation_mean.translate_mean: từ bên nầy qua bên kia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: moving in one side and out of the other side of (an opening, channel, or location).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she walked through the doorway into the living room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đi qua ô cửa vào phòng khách

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: continuing in time toward completion of (a process or period).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he showed up halfway through the second act
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta đã xuất hiện nửa chừng thông qua hành động thứ hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: so as to inspect all or part of (a collection, inventory, or publication).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã lật mặc dù các trang

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: by means of (a process or intermediate stage).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: dioxins get into mothers' milk through contaminated food
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Điôxin vào sữa mẹ thông qua thực phẩm bị ô nhiễm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing movement into one side and out of the other side of an opening, channel, or location.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: as soon as we opened the gate they came streaming through
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngay khi chúng tôi mở cổng họ đi truyền qua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: so as to continue in time toward the completion of a process, period, etc.
so as to inspect all or part of a publication or document.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she read the letter through carefully
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy đọc thư thông qua một cách cẩn thận

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: so as to be connected by telephone.
(of a means of public transportation or a ticket) continuing or valid to the final destination.
(of a room) running the whole length of a building.
having no prospect of any future relationship, dealings, or success.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she told him she was through with him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy nói với anh ấy rằng cô ấy đã thông qua anh ấy
